title: How can I restore older version of my note in notepad app? I accidentally replace text in my note.
content: I was writing my poem in notepad app and replaced that text with some other text that I copied previously. I didn't want to paste instead of my text. I have know idea what I did. My poem is lost and instead of it I have paste unwanted text. Is there anyway I can restore my poem from yesterday in my notepad? :'(
